name: bootstrap-electron-babel-react-sass
description: Bootstrap with electron, babel, react and sass

scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-scss
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-scss
scripts.package-all: npm run build && electron-packager ./ App --platform=all --arch=all --version=0.35.6 --out build
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && electron-packager ./ App --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=0.35.6 --out build
scripts.package-win: npm run build && electron-packager ./ App --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.35.6 --out build
scripts.package-mac: npm run build && electron-packager ./ App --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.35.6 --out build

author: jruchaud
